BLIST.ITEM: Place the figs, sugar, All-Bran, treacle and tea in a mixing bowl and leave to stand for 1 hour. Sift in the baking powder, add the flour and mix together thoroughly.
Turn into a lined and greased 1 kg loaf tin and bake in a preheated moderate oven, 180°C, Gas Mark 4, for 1¼ to 1½ hours.
Turn onto a wire rack to cool. Serve sliced, with butter.

CONTENT.I: source : "Home Baking" by Carole Handslip - page 74
